subject: French Open (Tennis)
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The 27-year-old Spaniard beat David Ferrer, his friend and compatriot, to become the first man in history to win eight singles titles at the same Grand Slam tournament.
snippet: The 27-year-old Spaniard beat David Ferrer, his friend and compatriot, to become the first man in history to win eight singles titles at the same Grand Slam tournament.
